Title: Play Region
Contents: A property of collisions in MSB which defines what can happen when the player stands on them.
Some regions allow pvp invaders; others allow placing summon signs; others are for boss fights and will create unstable collisions, prevent reloading in the arena.
Typically fog gates are put on play region boundaries while multiplayer is active.
In Bloodborne onward this is handled in params, but Dark Souls I uses a special convention: positive play region id for pvp/coop areas,
Based on the value of the event flag at ((region id)*-1 - 10)
